hero.subtitle: From landing pages to complex web applications. We turn your ideas into effective digital solutions that attract customers and grow business.

services.title: Our key services
services.subtitle: We offer a full development cycle to achieve your business goals.

development.title: Web Development
development.description: Modern, fast, and responsive websites on Next.js, working perfectly on any device.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: We design intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interfaces that users love.

seo.title: SEO Optimization
seo.description: We ensure high visibility of your website in search engines to attract organic traffic.

cta.title: Ready to start a project?
cta.subtitle: Tell us about your idea, and we will offer the best solution for its implementation.

ServicesPage.title: Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: We create digital products that help your business grow. From simple websites to complex web applications, we will find the perfect solution for your needs.

list.title: Landing Page
list.description: An effective one-page site to present a company, service, or product. It collects leads and increases conversion.

list.title: Corporate Website
list.description: A multi-page website representing your company on the Internet. It builds image and trust, and informs customers.

list.title: E-commerce Store
list.description: A full-fledged e-commerce platform for selling products online. Integration with payment systems and delivery services.

list.title: Promo Website
list.description: A bright and interactive site to promote a specific product or promotion. Maximum visual effect.

list.title: Web Portal
list.description: A complex information resource with a large number of sections and services, designed for high traffic.

list.title: Web Application
list.description: Development of complex interactive systems (SPA, PWA) on React/Next.js to solve unique business tasks.

list.title: Redesign and Support
list.description: Updating an outdated design, migrating to a new CMS, improving functionality, and providing technical support for your site.

list.title: SEO Promotion
list.description: A set of works to optimize a website for search engines in order to attract targeted traffic.

PricesPage.title: Our Pricing
PricesPage.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your goals. We offer flexible solutions for any type of business.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Ideal for landing pages and small projects.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Best choice for business websites and blogs.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For complex portals and web applications.

custom.title: Custom Project?
custom.subtitle: If none of the plans suit you, contact us for a custom quote.

about.description: Creating websites for your business in Georgia.
